wishes.wish1: How I got so lucky to end up with someone as beautiful as you I’ll never know, but I’m certainly not complaining about it! Happy birthday, baby.
wishes.wish2: God blessed me beyond measure when he brought you into my life.
wishes.wish3: I never thought that I could find someone as special as you. You make me a better person.
wishes.wish4: You’re the prettiest girl in the entire world and I can’t believe you’re mine!😍
wishes.wish5: Candles aren’t the only thing getting hotter! Happy birthday, hot stuff!🥵
wishes.wish6: I know your biggest wish came true when you met me.😁
wishes.wish7: We may need to call the fire department for all the candles on your birthday this year!
wishes.wish8: You are my today and all of my tomorrows.🤍
wishes.wish9: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
wishes.wish10: To the girl who has stolen my heart: Your birthday is the perfect time for me to remind you just how irresistible you are. Prepare for a day of fun, and celebration, all in your honor.
